# label

**Instance Property**

A string that helps you identify the capture scope.

## Declaration

```swift
var label: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Setting a capture scope’s label makes it easier to find in Xcode. See [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Xcode/Creating-and-using-custom-capture-scopes] for more information.

## Identifying the capture scope

- **device**: The device object from which you created the capture scope.
- **commandQueue**: The command queue that this capture scope uses to limit which commands are recorded.
